name: The Legend of Elrian
description:
The Legend of Elrian is an adventure inspired by adventure games of GameBoy era. The story takes place in an elven village where Famenor, the inheritor of the village leading, had mysteriously disappeared. You, Elrian (his brother), has to go to rescue him. You will have to pass through a dangerous forest to learn more about circumstances of this disappearance and try to rescue your brother.
Key features :
- 2D adventure with minimalized pixel art (5 colors)
- Different weapons to defeat your ennemies
- Riddles to solve for unlock ways
